Node.data: Senior experience from follow up of 100+ X-mas trees for a high number of vertical and horizontal projects and clients. In depth knowledge to Aker Solution and their sub-suppliers in Norway, Finland, Poland, UK, Italy, Czech Republic, Sweden and Denmark. Site responsibility for HSE, Quality, manufacturing and testing of manifolds and protection structures, including site Team Leader experience of a 4-discipline site team. Wide range subsea products experience from horizontal and vertical X-mas trees and associating tooling delivered by Aker Solutions, FMC, Cameron and Vetco. Hands-on experience with strong background from NDE, welding, assembly, machining, design, development and testing of branch leading technology like RLWI- (Riserless Well Intervention) Construction, Quality Control, Testing, Functional Operational supervision of X-mas trees and associated equipment. Secure Lessons Learned records and implementation of LL actions. Expediting and monitoring contractors/subcontractors work performance with regards to general performance, implementation of Quality Plans, Inspection and Test Plans and Procedures. Quality Control/Inspection and testing of industrial applications such as control units, HP units, tooling, pumps and valve skids for Norsk Hydro offshore and land-based plants world-wide.
